**Optometry Services at Nova Institution for Women - Solicitation**

**Solicitation Reference Number:** cb-150-83715350
**Tender Reference Number:** 21250-25-4901394

**Status:**
The solicitation is currently open, with a tender closing date of December 2, 2024 at 1:00 PM EST.

**Procurement Category:**
Service (SRV)
**Procurement Method:**
Competitive - Open bidding
**Trade Agreements:**
None

**Description:**

The Correctional Service of Canada (SCC) is seeking professionals to provide optometry services to inmates at Nova Institution for Women in Truro, Nova Scotia. The services will be provided under a contract commencing on April 1, 2025, and ending on March 31, 2028.

**Scope of Work:**

The successful contractor will be required to provide optometry services on an as-needed basis, including but not limited to, eye exams, visual acuity tests, and treatment of eye conditions. The contractor will also be responsible for prescribing corrective lenses and providing advice on maintaining good vision.

**Expressions of Interest:**

All interested suppliers may submit a bid.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

Bids will be evaluated on the basis of lowest price.

**Language of Work:**
Services must be provided in both official languages.

**Instructions for Bidders:**

* Download the solicitation document and associated documents from the Canada buys/tender opportunities website.
* Attend meetings and seminars as required.
* Submit bids according to the instructions provided in the solicitation document.

**Instructions for Contract Award:**

* Contract award will be made on the basis of best value for money.
* Contact the Contracting Authority for information.

**Notice of Tender:**

This notice is published in accordance with the Government Contracting Regulations.

**Points of Contact:**

* Sylvie Gallant, Contracting Authority
* Phone: (506) 378-8724
* Email: [Sylvie.Gallant@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Sylvie.Gallant@csc-scc.gc.ca)

**Alert:**

Please note that the Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

This alert will be removed once the call for tenders has ended.
